title: Chat with game designer Morello on 7/29!

replies.body: Anyone else think Morello should host an eating convention and call it Morello's Nomi-con?
First off, yes, but i think we all know the two who would tie for first.  ({{champion:223}} and {{champion:31}})
{{champion:20}} would be a close second
Ahem. THE ABYSSAL MOUTH ANYONE??? {{champion:96}}

you forgot {{champion:96}} 
lesser known, but his lore proves he eats pretty much anything in front of him(and as he has acid spit prolly eat forever without getting full)
oh no its kirby in league
{{champion:421}} You rang?
{{champion:79}} Ehm.
ok, first off, that is probably one of the best league puns ive ever heard, second, that was probably one of the best league puns ive ever heard :D

I like how theres only 2 comments. Morello I'm sorry people aren't taking this as NEWS. It should be though, talking with a Rioter could lend some excellent insight into the development process and the reasons behind certain decision. Riot's pretty clear and consistent with their message of course about champion and item design reworks and changes. I am very appreciative of that, please, never change it! On a side note, good luck ;)
I mean to be fair its only been up for twenty minutes
and this isnt where you're supposed to ask

So Morello, why did riot choose to rework champions like Fiora, who were played, over champions like, Mordekaiser, who hasn't seen play for a long time.   
I'm a big Morde fan, and would love it if he was viable again.
That's a pretty bold statement, he has a solid winrate, and I've seen various people perform great with him. Just because the LCS doesn't play him doesn't mean he's bad.

Morde is pretty strong in both the lane phase and once you learn him in the teamfight phase too, nothing wrong with this champion actually balanced unlike most others, and while after riot reworks Fiora she will either be broken or awfull

Kassalose is the champion Riot really needs to work on here, being the worst champion in the game right now
Morello? Morellonomicon? Don't think you're sneaky.

It actually used to not be named that, and be named something else, and I believe they almost changed the name to OmNomicon {{champion:31}} , no joke.

Can you tell me Old Sion's passive? I can't find anything on the interwebs.

Passive: Feel no Pain
Sion has a 40% chance to ignore up to30/40/50 damage each time he is attacked

> [{quoted}](name=SuperMeister,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVm8nPQQ,comment-id=002000000000,timestamp=2015-07-28T22:41:03.564+0000)
>
> It was called Morello's Evil Tome before {{item:3165}}

Wow. I found that funny at first, because I thought you were joking, but then I looked it up and it said it used to be named Morello's Evil Tome. I'm terrified now. D  :

Morello, 

East coast player here, can we get a estimate on when exactly the east coast server will be up and running and ready to use? Or the central server, thanks for what you do! Have a nice day!

I can actually field this one! We've been updating the boards and reddit every month or so since November through the [NA Server Roadmap](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/WH8doH76-na-servers-and-the-future). You can check out all the updates at the bottom of that main post.

I don't want to derail the discussion for Morello, but to address your exact question we're currently planning a centralized server move happening before the end of 2015.

Before the end of 2015 
Will I have under 100 ping before winter?
Find out next time on soon (tm)

Does he have any part in creating this horrible hud?  If so I'd like to have a few words with him, as I'm sure most of the community would as well.  As you can tell by the word horrible, it's not a positive thing.  This hud needs to go, now.

Morello most likely has nothing to do with the HUD. He's on the balance team, not on visuals.

I kinda really like the new HUD, and so do many others.
I kinda want to keep it, lot more simple and straightforward, not to mention cleaner.

Though that's just me.
I agree, the only thing is I dislike about the new HUD is that the ping buttons by the map are gone and I can't find champions crit chance anywhere

And I never used the ping buttons. I used G.
G is love, G is life

And yea, Conner is right, Crit chance is below(?) lifesteal.
Press C.
Please return MISS FORTUNE to her original form. THAT IS ALL!!!
Why? as far as I can tell none of the changes were nerfs.
Probably got his arse kicked by one.
Why is satan I mean teemo Being buffed?

> [{quoted}](name=Da Dwagonswayer,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVm8nPQQ,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2015-07-28T20:54:46.111+0000)
>
> Why is satan I mean teemo Being buffed?

Imo it's more of a nerf. Less shrooms on the map at one time, don't you just hate it when a Teemo blocks off every entrance to your portion of the jungle with shrooms?
Aaaaand how do you explain his passive buff? You can't really call permanent invisibility in bushes a nerf.

you mean teemo actually has a passive now? Cuz last I checked his passive was one of the most impractical and inaccessible passives in the game.

(ever since they removed the ability for it to activate while recalling that is)

I wouldn't quite call it impractical. Have you never had a Teemo appear in the middle of the lane, blind you and burst you to shreds?

And yes, they are _**buffing**_ his passive. He cloaks twice as quickly in brush and can move around freely in brush without losing invisibility.

Teemo was bad before...don't tell me he'll be balanced now.

> [{quoted}](name=Thunderbird330,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVm8nPQQ,comment-id=001b0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:15:54.675+0000)

> 
> And yes, they are _**buffing**_ his passive. He cloaks twice as quickly in brush and can move around freely in brush without losing invisibility.
> 
> Teemo was bad before...don't tell me he'll be balanced now.

Yeah, I've had him do that, but it doesn't do enough to kill me, and he misses out on a lot of gold if he doesn't get the kill. But I agree, his new passive effect could end up being stronger than intended.

> [{quoted}](name=Thunderbird330,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVm8nPQQ,comment-id=001b00000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T00:08:14.108+0000)
>
> Aaaaand how do you explain his passive buff? You can't really call permanent invisibility in bushes a nerf.

Oh yeah, I didn't see that patch note untill later and so forgot about it. He was buffed in one area, and nerfed in another, but overall I think the bad slightly outweighs the good, it's just an opinion though. I really don't understand all the hate for him, he can't do much besides poke you with his Q and AA's and bait you into walking into his shrooms, which if you're smart enough you won't do. In my opinion, he's a little bit weak.

He does DoT damage and has a global taunt that does DoT damage and Slows, not to mention that Q frickin' chunks, and his W passive makes him near impossible to catch up with if you don't have dashes or mobility.

Heyo!
Probably i have been disconnected too much from updates lately, but what role are you exactly filling in at Riot now?
I remember you replying to questions about champion design and balance ( i might be wrong? ), but lately those roles are filled in more by Meddler.
Also, i Remember all those taco tweets. why no more taco tweets? :c

What's the difference between a banana and a cucumber?

You can't make a long distance call with a cucumber.
The funny part is where people are asking all of the questions now instead of tomorrow when he will be taking them.

Does anyone think that they should give an option for players to whether use the new or old HUD? Because I've met a LOT of people who do not like the new HUD. A majority of them, including me, said that they would prefer going to a different game than getting used to the HUD changes.

This, in my opinion, is one of the principal reasons Riot is such a great company. Lots of community interaction is the bees knees.

(UI needs to be customizable. I love some things, but scaling and movability would allow us to create our own CLARITY. Also: Taric rework soon pls.)

They refuse to communicate with me. They suspended my account a day before the URF event happened, and had it end a day after URF ended, and didn't even give me a reason why, and the few times I was able to ask questions during Q&A's, they refused to answer them, and they were perfectly legitimate questions. (they had them at a time before I got home from summer school).
Is there some guy who just stalks my account and downvotes everything that I say? Or two guys.
I suck and I should be downvoted for no reason.

If your account got suspended, most likely you were an ass.
And they don't have time to answer every question. They prefer to answer more popular ones, the ones that people want to know the most, and not the ones that spoil the lore (thus removing player theories that people love to do, I have seen some).
